content:
description

" this is an extremely easy snuggle pattern that even the most inexperienced crocheter can make it is a great teaching pattern for beginners as well as a good exercise pattern for the elderly with hand/arm disabilities "

construction notes

worked with 2 strands of worsted weight yarn held as one strand if desired work a border around the snuggle for extra flair and to prevent the edges from curling

snuggles project mission statement

" the snuggles project was founded by our president rae french in 1996 the security blankets are called snuggles

" most shelter animals are kept in areas with stainless steel braces and hard plastic flooring or even bare concrete floors the snuggles would allow them to have a little reprieve from the coldness of the pen they are kept in

" while you are knitting crocheting or sewing your snuggles please respect the originality and the future of the project and give credit where credit is due "

keep the snuggles project alive

whenever you give your finished snuggles to a shelter let everyone know you re a part of the snuggles project effort fill out a donation report form to help count all the snuggles that are helping homeless animals
